H0.text: In Arthurian legend, the Fisher King is is the keeper of which relic. Excalibur

H1.text: In Arthurian legend, the Fisher King is is the keeper of which relic. The Holy Lance

H2.text: In Arthurian legend, the Fisher King is is the keeper of which relic. The Crown of Thorns

H3.text: In Arthurian legend, the Fisher King is is the keeper of which relic. Grail

A4.text: the latter is a 'very holy thing' in which a host is served that miraculously keeps the crippled Fisher King alive

A5.text: Various traditions describe the Holy Grail... often guarded in the custody of the Fisher King and located in the hidden Grail castle
